namespace

namespacenamespace supplies the formal name of the namespace to which the elements documented by its children belong. [2.3.4 The Tagging Declaration ]
Moduleheader â€” The TEI header
Attributes
  • att.global ( @xml:id , @n , @xml:lang , @xml:base , @xml:space ) (att.global.rendition ( @rend , @style , @rendition ) ) (att.global.linking ( @corresp , @synch , @sameAs , @copyOf , @next , @prev , @exclude , @select ) ) (att.global.analytic ( @ana ) ) (att.global.facs ( @facs ) ) (att.global.change ( @change ) ) (att.global.responsibility ( @cert , @resp ) ) (att.global.source ( @source ) )
    • @name
    specifies the full formal name of the namespace concerned.

    Example
    <namespace name="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"> <tagUsage gi="hi" occurs="28" withId="2"> Used only to mark English words italicized in the copy text </tagUsage> </namespace>
